title: Introducing: RABBIT
content:
“PSEUDO NIHILISTIC THREE PIECE” is one hell of a way to describe your band; RABBIT, you’ve got my attention.

So the production is far from squeaky clean, yet the key elements are definitely here on this Brisbane bands debut three track EP. Listening to Treehouse Kings I can’t help but feel there’s some sort of Libertines influence in amongst the Two Door Cinema Club / Bombay Bicycle Club / Royal Blood riffs. It’s lovably chaotic, the sort of thing that would have a tent of lairy sixteen year olds going ‘mad for it’ at Leeds Festival. Bags of potential here. Check out all three tracks from the DID WE? EP below, and download it from Bandcamp.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
